website_summaries.verdict: The slip-on design of the Skechers Ultra Flex - Bright Horizon captured the interest of many consumers. Users were satisfied with its durability, fit and lightweight nature. On the downside, the bungee laces made it a challenge to put on for some people. Despite the negative feedback, most owners were very pleased with how comfortable the trainer was for extended periods of use.
pros: A majority of owners found the Skechers Ultra Flex - Bright Horizon to be comfortable for all-day wear
The slip-on style and colorways of the trainer pleased numerous reviewers
Multiple testers claimed that the shoe was durable
Plenty of wearers enjoyed the lightweight nature of the footgear
The no-tie shoelaces delighted some purchasers
A handful of users thought that the fit was perfect
cons: The bungee shoelaces made the footwear tricky to put on, according to a couple of users
One person noted that the colors of the product were entirely different in person

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: At last a stylish trainer that fits my nightmare feet. Previously had to go for Hotters or Pavers with Velcro straps across. Have dreadful bunions. Usually need EEE width. These are sooooo comfortable. Ordered size 7 which is my size. Thought they were too tight ( here we go again - return) When I managed to get them on. Just stuff your feet in. Bliss - have had them on for 7 hours, standing most of time. No swelling. Hammer toes no cramp. Now have four Pairs. Different styles.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Odd shoes
customer_reviews.text: Funny story this... I wore them for a few days and they fit perfectly well, very comfortable. Then for no apparent reason I decided to measure the 2 shoes. The right shoe is half a size bigger than the left. No problem for me of course, my right foot is naturally slightly bigger than my left. The label inside the shoes are both size 3s so it was a labelling issue. I would advise anyone buying to check the shoes first to make sure they match before trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: Miss P C

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pair of trainers. Because I have a wide foot I tend to purchase footwear a size bigger meaning that the width is ok but the shoe is slightly longer which does not effect my walking. Due to Arthritis I decided I needed a pair of slip on shoes in order to avoid tying up shoe laces. I must say I am very happy with this purchase. These trainers are extremely light, fairly easy to put on and extremely comfortable. I definitely recommend them to anyone looking for light comfortable trainers.
customer_reviews.author: GJ64

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: These trainers fit like a glove. I wore them all day on the first day and it was like walking on air. I am normally a size 5 and I have wide feet but I purchased a size 4.5 as Skechers tend to be generous with their sizes. I love the fact that I don't have to tie laces. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shoppahoppa

customer_reviews.title: Again love these will be mostly wearing them come winter as ...
customer_reviews.text: Again love these will be mostly wearing them come winter as it is a replacement for another Skechers trainers which i am now replacing due to the soles being worn out. Again i have nothing but prays for Skechers they really do come out with some great designs on their trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slip on trainers
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are very comfy, although they are a tad large but I think that's probably because you can't tighten the laces like you can on other shoes. I have an injury to my right hand and it has made tying laces very painful and difficult so when I saw my gran with a pair of these (she had just had a hip replacement and was struggling to lean over and tie her laces) I thought it was exactly what I needed and has been brilliant to be able to just slip them in and head off outside. They are so soft to walk on its like wearing slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Ladies sketchers bright horizon trainers.
customer_reviews.text: I normally take a size 7, but I know sketchers are generous with their sizing and so I ordered a size 6 1/2 , they fit perfectly. They are a wide fitting and feel as if ai am wearing a pair of comfy slippers.they look stylish too, they are light as a feather .i wear them with trainer socks.would highly recommend.10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, comfortable, washable and laces that you don't have to do up! What's not to like?! I have some Skechers Go Walk series shoes which are brilliant in rough terrain so this Trainer style is going to be amazing! Like walking on air!
customer_reviews.author: cybercritter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I should of bought a 6 instead of a 6 1/2 so that’s my own fault Really comfy Great to get on and off after having surgery on my foot Still going to wear them even though they are a little big. They don’t seem to be slipping off when I walk Big thumbs up 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Hannah House

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Very light.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Light and comfortable. Bouncy. Easy to get on and off. But the packaging was really difficult to remove from the shoes and I hurt my hands trying to get it out. I do have problem with my hands but it was really difficult and painful. I nearly just sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Skinnygatso

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Got my skechers and they fit perfectly. Only downside is the sole does not have a great grip so in the wet weather the pavements can become slippery. Otherwise, great lightweight, colourful design, great price.
customer_reviews.author: kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything as advertised, light and comfortable, looks great. I worked them the day they arrived and did a 4K walk, my knees felt great because of the cushioning. Size 35 was perfect for me, I don’t often get the small sizes for adults.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainer. Comfortable as I have a wide foot. Would recommend for people with foot problems, rheumatic illnesses, or arthritis. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley H.

customer_reviews.title: Welcome back Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness Skechers have got their mojo back! Used to be a great fan for comfort and style- but recently their style was more like old mens slippers and the mesh in swimming trunks! Welcome back skechers
customer_reviews.author: jennymac

customer_reviews.title: Great item, perfectly comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great item, I went a size bigger than I am and that heped and perfectly comfy to wear for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Too large for the size BUT a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: ... please let me explain. I’d already ordered a UK size 5 which were huge for me but I loved them so much I took the chance and ordered a UK size 4 instead and they fit perfectly !!! I am still a UK size 5 BTW my feet have not shrunk.
customer_reviews.author: Heide S.

customer_reviews.title: Very content.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, really light, breathable, stand with me 10 hours at work, commute with me daily for almost an hour, very practical, quick to wear and don't just slip off, nice look. All that at a very reasonable price, especially as, 2 weks on, I did not need to change soles for comfort. Very content.
customer_reviews.author: Fussy Tongue

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to ware especially as in up and down all day, the shoes are light and easy to slip off and on quickly where required especially as I work with children
customer_reviews.author: sharon Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Left out in the rain
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and good price . Marked the seller down as left outside the front door in the rain despite my account stating clearly to leave in the greenhouse when I am not in
customer_reviews.author: cheshire

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE them!! Easy to put them on, so light that I almost forget wearing them. I love the colours. And I cannot stop taking them every time I go out
customer_reviews.author: Catalin Petrescu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: 3rd time I’ve purchased these. Perfect for my work as a midwife.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality shoe.
customer_reviews.text: They are instantly comfortable. I can walk any distance with no problems. They support the feet too.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is important to me- and reasonable in price
customer_reviews.text: These sketchers are really confortable as i would keep buying them from amazon , qualitys there- only one moan i wanted the lightercolour and the lighter was ordered but decided it dosent matter when i got the darker quality alwaysq
customer_reviews.author: Mattie roberts

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOOTWEAR ☺️
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, look great are great. Very comfortable and quick to get on your feet and be on your way. Value for money,fast delivery. Got no complaints about these Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Alicat😻

customer_reviews.title: Fab trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers, sooo comfy, look really trendy. As always with Skechers I go down half a size, perfect fit. I’m a 6 & bought a 5 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: L. House

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely buy another pair when I've worn these out. They're just like wearing slippers

customer_reviews.title: 5 but they don't slip and I like the wee bit of extra room
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 5 which is my usual size. Could probably have done with 4.5 but they don't slip and I like the wee bit of extra room. They are so comfortable and light as a feather. Also very stylish. Love them.

customer_reviews.title: Like Walking on Air
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable trainers, even with my wide feet. I take a size 8 (just) and these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. H. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Hesven
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my feet and knees I have been able to get my insoles in and are really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: audrey ferguson

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality as always for the sketchers brand
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sketchers. Ordered for spring /summer. They are good quality as always for the sketchers brand. Can be worn without socks as they are knitted type. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Donated cloth & shoes

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable trainers I have ever worn, walking and working out at the gym they are very very comfortable. I will be buying more.

customer_reviews.title: Always comfy!
customer_reviews.text: If I order a sketchers uk 7,I know they will fit,the sizing is very accurate.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely for walking
customer_reviews.text: Bought these trainers as I wanted to find some that were comfortable when walking and they are just that. With the memory foam my feet didn’t ache at all. Lovely fit as I have a wide foot, plenty of toe room and a good support to the rest of the foot. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: I love them! This pair has air cool insoles
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of sketchers & have quiet a few pair, I love them! This pair has air cool insoles, I find them easy to get on & off, with the elasticated laces & are comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 7,but I found these skechers too big,,I usually get size 7 in skechers

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for me after ankle surgery. They are a very comfortable pair of shoes giving the support required.
customer_reviews.author: flakey

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 7 and they're a perfect fit they are light and comfortable I will be buying these again

customer_reviews.title: More like a size 8 than 7
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size seven they were to large for me. (Also narrow foot).

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable possible
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I dislike, these are perfect I have several pairs . Since a double knee replacement these help me so much with my walking

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, comfortable and can be used for anything from just walking to high impact training *****
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent trainers, I use these for running on the treadmill, cycling, everything every day. Best pair of trainers I've ever bought they are very comfortable and make you feel like you are walking on air. The absence of laces was brilliant and was very useful when i was plus size as I struggled to do up my laces on ordinary trainers.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable

customer_reviews.text: Normally a size 6 which arrived huge and very loose and wide. Exchanges very efficiently for size 5 which are long enough but very snug in comparison to the 6. The shoe has an elastic closure but are not adjustable so cant loosen or tighten

customer_reviews.text: Sketchers are the most comfortable leisure shoe...and that’s a fact!

customer_reviews.text: Really cool looking too. I sometimes need to take a size 7 but the 6.5 size fits beautifully, so my only advice is don't a bigger size thinking they will fit better.

customer_reviews.text: super fast delivery, shoes as described, first wear I was on my feet for 6 hrs and they where super comfy, highly recommend 🤩

customer_reviews.title: Love my Skechers
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. As expected from skechers. Great if your on your feet all day. Love the colour of these too. Will be buying another pair come payday!

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy! Well worth the price!

customer_reviews.title: Love them, they are more orange than pink though
customer_reviews.text: Love them, they are more orange than pink though, but still very comfortable. I AMA size 8, ordered an 8 and the fit is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these sketchers, I now have 3 pairs in different styles. They are worth the money and last very well. True to size.

customer_reviews.text: These trainers are very comfortable and look fab too. Love that there are no laces to tie and that they are so lightweight. Really happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy 😁
customer_reviews.text: Walked/ran 5 miles first use and may as well have been wearing my slippers they were that comfy 😁

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a very narrow foot & found them to wide otherwise I would of kept them.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, fits perfectly and is great shoe as it’s slip on

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, style & design
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Skechers. The previous one lasted for a year and i was very pleased with it. I wear the shoe for work, and this being slip on closure it only takes few seconds for me to wear them in the morning. No more issues of knotting the laces. These are really lightweight and comfortable to wear for long periods of time highly recommend for comfy walking.
customer_reviews.author: Neens

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: so comfortable my my has problems with her bunions etc and foot pain these really help she worn them for first time for 5 hours shopping she loves them

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy straight away
customer_reviews.text: Had a bad foot and needed a good shoe for support. These are so comfortable and for amazingly. I feel like I should have switched to sketcher a long time ago. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfy trainers as all sketchers easy to put on

product_meta.title: Skechers Women Ultra Flex-Bright Horizon Trainers
product_meta.description: Knitted high apex bungee slip-on with air-cooled memory foam
